p: Folin-Ciocalteu reagent, sodium carbonate, sodium nitrite, aluminum chloride, DPPH, caffeic acid, caffeoyquinic acid, p-coumaric acid, protocatechuic acid, kaempferol, hyperoside, rutin hydrate, and dimethylsufoxide (DMSO) were purchased from Sigma Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA). Solvents such as acetone, acetonitrile, methanol. and water (HPLC-MS grade) were purchased from Carlo erba (Peypin, France).
